name: Warbringers Of Angrul
description:
Warbringers of Angrul is a real time strategy game that combines the management of an overarching campaign map with the excitement of leading your troops in real time battles. You will enter a fantasy world and choose from an array of races and faction to lead to victory over your foes. With the ability to play against the AI in singleplayer, or against your friends in multiplayer, you are sure to be hooked for hours on end. Will you choose diplomacy and trading to help build up your kingdom, or will you go down the warpath and conquer everyone that stands in your way?

To become part of our community, you can join our Discord server. Or if you want to learn more about our game, visit our website.

Price will increase as additional features get added.

Current Features


  • Singleplayer Grand Campaign map
  • Massive Real time battles



  • Diverse ways to customize and build up each city
  • Unique troops to recruit into your armies ranging from priests, mages, and musketeers



  • Fight against different size bandit parties to gain loot and resources
  • Two playable factions:
  • The Kingdom of Arran is a martial kingdom that relies on a mix of heavy infantry, heavy calvalry, and gunpowder to win battles.
  • The Eternal Crusade seeks to ensure humanity's survival and dominance through the use of healing and fire magic combined with their highly trained and zealous troops.

Planned Features

  • Multiplayer/Co-op grand campaign
  • Matchmaking on 1v1 map
  • More Playable Factions And Races
  • Roadmap
  • A Pure Battle Mode, where you can get right into action.

Want to suggest a feature? Make sure to join our Discord!
